title: Bug 17703: Edit/Add Task action uses different dialog than Java Editor
description: When executing the 'Add Task' action on a selected CU in the Packages view, a different dialog appears compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
OB: When pressing F1 and selecting a CU in the Packages view, executing 'File > Add Task': A different dialog appears than when executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The 'Edit/Add Task' action should display the same dialog in the Packages view as it does when performed from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR:
1. Open the Packages view.
2. Select a CU.
3. Press F1.
4. Choose 'File > Add Task'.
5. Note the dialog displayed.
6. Open a Java file in the editor.
7. Right-click on the ruler context menu.
8. Choose 'Add Task'.
9. Compare the dialog with the one in step 5.
